app.name.description: Application display name shown in Canva

app.description.defaultMessage: Data connector for ShopinistaMeta feeds, enabling secure data access and high-fidelity content workflows.
app.description.description: Short description of the app for listings and tooltips

button.connect.description: Primary action to start authentication and link the user account

button.disconnect.description: Action to remove the current authentication/session

error.auth.description: Error message shown when the user needs to authenticate before proceeding

list.search.placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the search input in the data view

list.empty.description: Message shown when a query returns no data

status.loading.description: Status text while fetching data from the connector

status.ready.description: Status text when the connector has loaded and is interactive
